description: This source file defines a React component for the 'Connectors' page in a web application. It manages the display of available connectors (such as Jira and Confluence), their connection statuses, and includes live search components for these connectors. The file handles fetching connector data from an API, manages connection state, and renders various UI elements including loading and error messages.

methods.name: ConnectorsPageInner
methods.description: Main React component rendering the connectors management UI, fetching connector states, and rendering search components.

methods.name: ConnectorsPage
methods.description: External export component that wraps 'ConnectorsPageInner' with React Suspense fallback.
